query: mutation UpdateMultiRowAnswersMutation($input: UpdateMultiRowAnswersInput!, $questionSetSignature: String!) { result: updateMultiRowAnswers( input: $input questionSetSignature: $questionSetSignature ) { document { currentSentenceCursor lastLabeledLine id lastSavedAt statistic { ...StatisticFragment } } previousAnswers { ...RowAnswerFragment } updatedAnswers { ...RowAnswerFragment } } } fragment RowAnswerFragment on RowAnswer { documentId line answers metadata { ...AnswerMetadataFragment } updatedAt } fragment AnswerMetadataFragment on AnswerMetadata { path labeledBy } fragment StatisticFragment on TextDocumentStatistic { documentId labelerStatistic { ...LabelerStatisticFragment } numberOfChunks numberOfSentences numberOfTokens numberOfEntitiesLabeled numberOfNonDocumentEntitiesLabeled touchedSentences nonDisplayedLines } fragment LabelerStatisticFragment on LabelerStatistic { userId numberOfAcceptedLabels numberOfRejectedLabels }
